title: Shameful lack of moderation
text: The app works decent as a messenger app. Problem is they don’t seem to moderate the public content at all. A lot of smut and people trying to conduct shady business. If they cleaned it up it would be a decent app.

title: App on iOS 17.4 Beta - messages aren’t being delivered
text: Over the last couple of weeks, when texting someone or them texting you, the messages don’t arrive until the recipient goes in and checks the message themselves. Then all the messages get delivered all at once, even if they are hours old with that, notifications aren’t showing up for any new messages, because they’re not delivered until, you check the messages. In many instances when the messages are dumped all at once, they’re also not in order. Not sure what’s happened with Telegram, as it used to be a good app, but it’s slowly sliding into the gutter.

title: Fantastic Concept Awash in Bugs
text:
Like literally swimming in them. You can make groups, but it’s going to add and remove any channel it feels like at random (sometimes a group will break and every channel ever will be added to it up to the max, including every new one you follow—take them out, it’ll put them back). 

You can pay for premium, but sometimes it’ll glitch out and pretend you didn’t (limiting your pins to the regular arbitrary number until you restart). I’ve had it happen with the number of channels you can follow too.

You even try to do something as simple as re-order your pins, and the editor only works for two moves (at which point it starts only moving it one space per grab & then dropping it or it just refreshes you to the top of the screen with nothing moved).

If this simple stuff were fixed, it’d be 5 stars from me. I don’t like them caving to Big Tech censorship, but I do like that they’ve preserved the integrity of the web version at least. It’s so frustrating dealing with these obnoxious bugs though. And there’s no such thing as support. It’s completely non-responsive (they’re as likely to look at your message as X is to read your appeal), which is a little crazy when you’re paying for something.

I sincerely hope this app can be cleaned up because it really does crush the competition in many ways. Overall, I’ll keep using it, but I have to wonder if I should keep paying for premium under these conditions.
